name: Enough Torque!
description:
An Entry in the 2019 Butterscotch Shenanijam by KeysandCheese, Chuck Nadum, and That_Rumpus! The theme we chose was "Wrenches 101".

A short little beat 'em up game with some jokes thrown in! You play as a handyman who has never seen a wrench before. Join him on his adventure to find one!

Font used in game was Sonic 1 HUD courtesy of fontstruct.com, available under Creative Commons. Shenanijam Logo courtesy of Butterscotch Shenanigans.
 Everything else was made by KeysandCheese, Chuck Nadum, and That_Rumpus!

Chuck Nadum's Soundcloud (He did the music/Sound Effects!) - https://soundcloud.com/chucknadum
